parameter.dataSource:
dataSources:
 ds_0:
  dataSourceClassName: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
  props:
    jdbcUrl: jdbc:h2:mem:test_db_0;DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1;DATABASE_TO_UPPER=false;MODE=MySQL
    username: root
    password: 'password'
parameter.rule:
rules:
- !SHARDING
  defaultDatabaseStrategy:
    standard:
      shardingAlgorithmName: inline
      shardingColumn: user_id
  tables:
    t1:
      actualDataNodes: ds_0.t1
      keyGenerateStrategy:
        column: order_id
      logicTable: t1
      tableStrategy:
        standard:
          shardingAlgorithmName: inline
          shardingColumn: order_id
    t2:
      actualDataNodes: ds_0.t2
      keyGenerateStrategy:
        column: order_item_id
      logicTable: t2
      tableStrategy:
        standard:
          shardingAlgorithmName: inline
          shardingColumn: order_id

parameter.dataSource:
dataSources:
 ds_1:
  dataSourceClassName: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
  props:
    jdbcUrl: jdbc:h2:mem:test_db_1;DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1;DATABASE_TO_UPPER=false;MODE=MySQL
    username: root
    password: 'password'
 ds_2:
  dataSourceClassName: com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
  props:
    jdbcUrl: jdbc:h2:mem:test_db_2;DB_CLOSE_DELAY=-1;DATABASE_TO_UPPER=false;MODE=MySQL
    username: root
    password: 'password'
parameter.rule:
rules:
- !SHARDING
  defaultDatabaseStrategy:
    standard:
      shardingAlgorithmName: inline
      shardingColumn: user_id
  tables:
    t1:
      actualDataNodes: ds_$->{1..2}.t1
      keyGenerateStrategy:
        column: order_id
      logicTable: t1
      tableStrategy:
        standard:
          shardingAlgorithmName: inline
          shardingColumn: order_id
    t2:
      actualDataNodes: ds_$->{1..2}.t2
      keyGenerateStrategy:
        column: order_item_id
      logicTable: t2
      tableStrategy:
        standard:
          shardingAlgorithmName: inline
          shardingColumn: order_id
